'''Ninwi''' was a city of [[Men]] in the [[Great Lands]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. It was identified with the city of [[wikipedia:Nineveh|Nineveh]].<ref name=Nin>{{LT2|IIIn}}, p. 203</ref>

It was mentioned in the tale of ''[[The Fall of Gondolin (chapter)|the Fall of Gondolin]]'' by [[Littleheart]], where he compared its [[Fall of Gondolin|fall]] as even being worse than Ninwi's.<ref>{{LT2|III}}, p. 196</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Ninwi'' is in [[Qenya]], according to [[Paul Strack]], but its meaning is unclear. However, it was probably a phonological imitation of ''Nineveh''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1818104003.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Ninwi'' pn.|website=Eldamo|accessed=14 May 2022}}</ref>

An earlier form of the name was ''Ninwë''.<ref name=Nin/>
